name: Pumpkin Party (swsandra, jaoc1811, CalitoRivero)
description:
Warning: flashing lights

Pumpkin Party is a rhythm game where you are Jack-O-Lantern and you have to prepare the pumpkins so they can be ready for Halloween.

Your objective is to carve, light or destroy the pumpkins following the rhythm of the music!

This game was made for One Minute Game jam #8.

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

Controls:

  • W or Up Key to look up
  • S or Down Key to look down
  • J to carve pumpkins
  • K to light pumpkins
  • L to destroy pumpkins

Credits:

Music:

Tragedy Waiting To Happen by HoliznaCC0 - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/holiznacc0/horseless-headman-halloween-beats/tragedy-waiting-to-happen/

Halloween Funk by Joakim Karud - https://soundcloud.com/joakimkarud/halloween-funk

Fall Squash || Pixel Art Asset Pack by Pop Shop Packs - https://pop-shop-packs.itch.io/fall-squash-pixel-art-asset-pack

Explosion Animations Pack by ansimuz - https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

2d Animated Halloween characters by Ismartal - https://ismartal.itch.io/2d-animated-halloween-characters

16*16 Pixel art graveyard tileset by angrysnail - https://angrysnail.itch.io/pixel-art-graveyard-tileset

GUI Essential by Crusenho - https://crusenho.itch.io/gui-essential-basic-paper-wood-stone-metal-hologram
